Player History
Drafted in 5th round, 141st overall pick, by Chicago (A) in 2011...
Injured on 5/5/2012 with a Pulled Anterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 4 weeks...
Injured on 6/7/2012 with a Broken Hand, out for 6 weeks...
Traded from Chicago (A) to Detroit on 2/12/2013 (Going to DET: SS R. Pierson. Going to CHA: CF N. Mclouth)...
Traded from Detroit to Cleveland on 4/23/2014 (Going to CLE: SS R. Pierson, 1B T. Harrison. Going to DET: P S. Hernandez)...
Injured on 5/12/2015 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 4 days...
Had first career hit on 8/19/2015, off Marcus Stroman (DET)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/22/2015, off Sean Henn (TEX)...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against Toronto on 4/6/2016...
Drove in 6 runs against Chicago (A) on 8/23/2016...
Injured on 9/7/2016 with a Torn Bicep Muscle, out for full season...
Traded from Cleveland to New York (A) on 4/21/2018 (Going to CLE: DH R. Raburn, RF M. Mahtook, P K. Gausman. Going to NYA: SS R. Pierson, RF A. Presley)...
Released by New York (A) on 6/30/2020...
Signed as a free agent by Cleveland on 6/30/2020 to a minor league deal...
Injured on 7/6/2021 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago (A) on 4/17/2023 to a minor league deal...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago (A) on 2/13/2024 to a 1-year deal worth $387,100 per year...
